an6.104:4.1: “Mendicants, seeing six benefits is quite enough to establish unqualified perception of not-self in all things.
an6.104:4.3: ‘I will be without identification in the whole world.’ ‘My I-makings will stop.’ ‘My mine-makings will stop.’ ‘I will have unshared knowledge.’ ‘I will clearly see causes and the phenomena that arise from causes.’
an6.104:4.4: Seeing these six benefits is quite enough to establish unqualified perception of not-self in all things.”
